event.title: Let's look into GraphQL - bring your laptop!
event.description:
Let's take our example Beer API and write it in GraphQL. 

If anyone has any experience of using GraphQL and would be up for leading this session, get in touch! Otherwise I've got a month to brush up on that :D

See you there!

Kat

Bring your laptop with:

• Golang

• Git

• Atom / VCode Editor (or any other go editor of your choice)

Check out our REST-ish implementation of the Beer API on github!
